thread.title: The 5 Best Celebrity Reactions to the Oscars Tour Bus Prank
thread.title_full: The 5 Best Celebrity Reactions to the Oscars Tour Bus Prank

author: Eliza Thompson
title: The 5 Best Celebrity Reactions to the Oscars Tour Bus Prank
text:
The 5 Best Celebrity Reactions to the Oscars Tour Bus Prank 
Here's hoping Denzel is really ordained. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Devoted prankster Jimmy Kimmel brought his antics to the Oscars stage on Sunday, and for his big number surprised a bus full of Hollywood tour bus patrons with a trip onto the stage. Skeptics among you probably that these people were actors, but close watchers noticed that at least woman was shaking so much she seemed in danger of passing out. Also, there is no way Gary’s personality could be invented by anyone other than his own shining self. Below, the five best celebrity reactions to a bus load of civilians crashing their fancy party. 1. Mahershala Ali. Mahershala, as one of only two actors in possession of an Oscar at that point in the show, was for some reason volunteered as the person who would let the tour bus people touch his award. Not only did he agree to let this happen, he took a selfie with tour bus king Gary. 2. Ryan Gosling. He stood up and gave Gary some candy. Vicky responded by telling Ryan, "You're beautiful." She's not wrong! Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 3. Nicole Kidman. She greeted Gary with a big smile, and Gary in turn kissed her hand. Why is Gary not winning any awards at this thing? Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 4. Jennifer Aniston. She was super-excited to see everyone, and even pulled a pair of sunglasses out of her purse to give to Vicky as a souvenir of the evening. 5. Denzel Washington. After being asked who her favorite actor was, Vicky replied, “That man right there,” meaning Denzel. Denzel then stood up and pronounced Gary and Vicky husband and wife. This is totally legally binding, right? Advertisement - Continue Reading Below In conclusion, here’s Vicky one more time. Follow Eliza on Twitter .
